704180f-a.text:
Flatbush Ave. (foreground), east side, south from the intersection of Fulton Street and Flatbush Ave. The Fulton Street Elevated line of the B.M.T. is shown winding its way eastward on Fulton Street. lIn the background colonnaded is the Masonic Temple located at Lafayette and Clermont Aves. The yrtle Ave. Line is on Flatbush Ave. (foreground). This view
also shows a general view eastward.
August 12, 1929.
704180f-a.folder: Flatbush Avenue & Fulton Street, Brooklyn, NY

705946f-a.text:
Nevins Street, south from Flatbush Ave. Also Flatbush Ave., west side, east from Nevins Street. This view is no longer existent. The buildings were razed, to make way for the new Fox Theatreg a motion picture house.
June 1926.
Brown Brothors.
